metadata.synopsis: One liner for Gondian Worker09 (Grindo Biggs) for after saving the Gondians. He is angry at the player for not arriving sooner to save him and the others.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Grindo Biggs

0.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
0.text: About time someone showed up. Did we finally reach your 'dead gondian' quota? Is that why it took so long for anyone to help us?
0.context: NodeContext: He's grateful to be alive but also feels guilty he's survived when so many haven't. Bitter, angry, grieving

2.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
2.text: Are you a hero or a useless bum? Move.
2.context: NodeContext: He's grateful to be alive but also feels guilty he's survived when so many haven't. Bitter, angry, grieving

3.speaker: Gondian Grindo Biggs
3.text: If you're waiting for thanks, you'll get none from me. Go help the others, go on!
3.context: NodeContext: He's grateful to be alive but also feels guilty he's survived when so many haven't. Bitter, angry, grieving
